com.qoppa.pdf

Class ResizePageOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qoppa.pdf.ResizePageOptions

  • public class ResizePageOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    This object controls the behavior of the library when resizing the PDFPage.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResizePageOptions()
      Constructs a default ResizePageOptions object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getMediaBox()
      Returns the new media box for the PDFPage.
      double getRotation()
      Returns the amount to rotate the page contents in radians.
      double getScale()
      Returns scale to be applied to the page content.
      double getXOffset()
      Returns the x offset of the page contents.
      double getYOffset()
      Returns the y offset of the page contents.
      boolean isAutoScale()
      Returns the option to scale the page contents to fit inside the new media box.
      boolean isCenter()
      Returns the option to center the page contents in the new media box.
      boolean isFitToMedia()
      Returns the fit to media option.
      void setAutoScale(boolean autoScale)
      Sets the option to scale the page contents to fit inside the new media box.
      void setCenter(boolean center)
      Sets the option to center the page contents in the new media box.
      void setFitToMedia(boolean fit)
      If true then the page's crop box will be set equal to the page's media box, otherwise the crop box will have the same margins as before resizing.

      Sets the new media box for the PDFPage.

      Sets the amount to rotate the page contents in radians.

      Sets the scale to be applied to the page content.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResizePageOptions

        public ResizePageOptions()
        Constructs a default ResizePageOptions object.

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaBox

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getMediaBox()
        Returns the new media box for the PDFPage.
        Returns:
        The new media box. The dimensions are given in PostScript points. 1 inch = 72 points, 1cm = 28.3465 points, 1mm = 2.8346 points

      • setMediaBox

        public void setMediaBox(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D mediaBox)
        Sets the new media box for the PDFPage.
        Parameters:
        mediaBox - The new media box. The dimensions are given in PostScript points. 1 inch = 72 points, 1cm = 28.3465 points, 1mm = 2.8346 points

      • isCenter

        public boolean isCenter()
        Returns the option to center the page contents in the new media box. The default value is false.
        Returns:
        The center option.

      • setCenter

        public void setCenter(boolean center)
        Sets the option to center the page contents in the new media box.
        Parameters:
        center - The center option.

      • isAutoScale

        public boolean isAutoScale()
        Returns the option to scale the page contents to fit inside the new media box. The default value is false.
        Returns:
        The scale option

      • setAutoScale

        public void setAutoScale(boolean autoScale)
        Sets the option to scale the page contents to fit inside the new media box.
        Parameters:
        autoScale - The scale option

      • getXOffset

        public double getXOffset()
        Returns the x offset of the page contents.
        Returns:
        The x offset

      • setXOffset

        public void setXOffset(double xOffset)
        Sets the x offset of the page contents. If the center or auto scale option is set to true, then this value is not used.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - The y offset

      • getYOffset

        public double getYOffset()
        Returns the y offset of the page contents.
        Returns:
        The y offset

      • setYOffset

        public void setYOffset(double yOffset)
        Sets the y offset of the page contents. If the center or auto scale option is set to true, then this value is not used.
        Parameters:
        yOffset - The y offset

      • getScale

        public double getScale()
        Returns scale to be applied to the page content. This value is not used if auto scale is set to true.
        Returns:
        The scale value

      • setScale

        public void setScale(double scale)
        Sets the scale to be applied to the page content. This value is not used if auto scale is set to true.
        Parameters:
        scale - The scale value

      • getRotation

        public double getRotation()
        Returns the amount to rotate the page contents in radians.
        Returns:
        The rotation value

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(double rotation)
        Sets the amount to rotate the page contents in radians. A positive value rotates the page counter clockwise.
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation value

      • setFitToMedia

        public void setFitToMedia(boolean fit)
        If true then the page's crop box will be set equal to the page's media box, otherwise the crop box will have the same margins as before resizing. The default is false.
        Parameters:
        fit - The fit to media option

      • isFitToMedia

        public boolean isFitToMedia()
        Returns the fit to media option.
        Returns:
        The fit to media option
